rules.rule_text: All abstracts that coincide with disease area of interest (IgA Nephropathy)

values: B cell depletion +/- B cell activation +/- B cell targeting
Complement proteins +/- C3 Complement +/- C4 Complement
BAFF +/- APRIL; OR APRIL alone; OR BAFF/April; OR Blys/April; OR APRIL/BLyS
AT1/EDNRA antagonist? +/- ERA +/- endothelian receptor antagonist
Complement Factor B inhibitor +/- alternative pathway +/- complement inhibition +/- complement system inhibitors
Systemic steroid +/- Systemic glucocorticoid +/- Systemic corticosteroid
optimized supportive care +/- ACE/ARB +/- RASi +/- RAASi
Gd-IgA OR IgA1 OR Gd-IgA1 OR Galactose deficient

rules.rule_text: Abstracts assigned by the Calliditas team
All relevant abstracts that include Phase 2/3 data (including meta-analyses), real-world data (including patient reported outcomes, retrospective analyses and registry data)
All relevant abstracts that include Phase 1 data, general HEOR studies, prognostic studies, preclinical studies, or other general studies
All relevant abstracts that only have mention of an indication of interest and does not include any other data

values: BAFF +/- APRIL; OR APRIL alone; OR BAFF/April; OR Blys/April; OR APRIL/BLyS
AT1/EDNRA antagonist? +/- ERA +/- endothelian receptor antagonist
Complement Factor B inhibitor +/- alternative pathway +/- complement inhibition +/- complement system inhibitors
Systemic steroid +/- Systemic glucocorticoid +/- Systemic corticosteroid
optimized supportive care +/- ACE/ARB +/- RASi +/- RAASi
B cell depletion +/- B cell activation +/- B cell targeting
Complement proteins +/- C3 Complement +/- C4 Complement
Gd-IgA OR IgA1 OR Gd-IgA1 OR Galactose deficient
